00010 #ifndef _METHOD_MEMBER_H__
00011 #define _METHOD_MEMBER_H__
00012 
00013 #include "member.h"
00014 #include "delegate/Delegate.h"
00015 #include "common/typetraits.h"
00016 
00017 namespace reflection
00018 {
00020 
00022 
00023         class REFLECTION_API method_member : public member
00024         {
00025         public:
00026 
00027                 template<class Deleg>
00028                 static method_member create(const char* name, const Deleg& deleg, function_type* type)
00029                 {
00030                         static_assert(sizeof(Deleg) <= _deleg_buf_size, "Delegate buffer too small");
00031                         return method_member(name, (void*)&deleg, type);
00032                 }
00033 
00034                 method_member(const char* name, void* deleg, function_type* type);
00035 
00037                 function_type* get_function_type() const;
00038 
00039                 void invoke(void** args, void* result) const;
00040 
00041                 virtual method_member* clone() const;
00042 
00043                 virtual void release();
00044 
00045         private:
00046                 class method_impl;
00047                 method_impl* m_impl;
00048 
00049                 method_member(method_impl* impl);
00050         };
00051 
00053 
00055 
00056         class method
00057         {
00058         public:
00059 
00060                 typedef method_member member_type;
00061                 static const EMemberType member_id = MEMBER_METHOD;
00062 
00063                 method() : m_method(0), m_offset(0) { }
00064 
00065                 method(const method_member& mth, size_t offset) : m_method(&mth), m_offset(offset) { }
00066 
00067                 const char* get_name() const { return m_method->get_name(); }
00068 
00069                 function_type* get_function_type() const { return m_method->get_function_type(); }
00070 
00071                 void invoke(void** args, void* result) const 
00072                 {
00073                         // Adjust pointer before the call
00074                         void** oldInst = (void**)args[0];
00075                         void* newInst = adjustptr(*oldInst, m_offset);
00076                         args[0] = &newInst;
00077 
00078                         m_method->invoke(args, result); 
00079 
00080                         // Restore initial value
00081                         args[0] = oldInst;
00082                 }
00083 
00084         private:
00085                 const method_member* m_method;
00086                 size_t m_offset;
00087         };
00088

00091 } // namespace
